pr_title: fix: fail access check when no csrf token in session

timeline.message: fix: fail access check when no csrf token in session

timeline.author: platosha

replies.bodyText:
This fails requests with a token header when there is no session. Any reasons behind it?

Isn't this exactly the case that the session has expired, and a cached request is being submitted (with an outdated csrf token)?
it could be fine when there is no csrf token in the request header, e.g. using curl.
replies.author: haijian-vaadin

replies.bodyText: If the session has expired, it should fail elsewhere in isLoggedIn kind of check.
replies.author: platosha
